00038 void testDifferenceQuotient()
00039 {
00040     if (os_) *os_ << "****************************************************\n";
00041     if (os_) *os_ << "testDifferenceQuotient()\n";
00042 
00043     using namespace DerivativeTest;
00044 
00045     class TestFunction : public VectorFunction<double>
00046     {
00047         public:
00048 
00049         // f(x,y) = (x^2, xy, y^2)
00050 
00051         virtual unsigned int argumentCount() const {return 2;}
00052         virtual unsigned int valueCount() const {return 3;}
00053 
00054         virtual ublas::vector<double> operator()(ublas::vector<double> x) const
00055         {
00056             if (x.size() != argumentCount())
00057                 throw logic_error("[TestFunction::()] Wrong argument count.");
00058 
00059             ublas::vector<double> result(3);
00060             result(0) = x(0)*x(0);
00061             result(1) = x(0)*x(1);
00062             result(2) = x(1)*x(1);
00063             return result;
00064         }
00065     };
00066 
00067 
00068     TestFunction f;
00069     ublas::vector<double> args(2);
00070     args(0) = 5; args(1) = 7;
00071     if (os_) *os_ << "f(5,7): " << f(args) << endl;
00072 
00073     if (os_) f.printDifferenceQuotientSequence(args, *os_);
00074 
00075     // f'(x,y) = ((2x, y, 0), (0, x, 2y))
00076     // f'(5,7) = ((10, 7, 0), (0, 5, 14))
00077 
00078     ublas::matrix<double> d(2,3);
00079     d(0,0) = 10;
00080     d(0,1) = 7;
00081     d(0,2) = 0;
00082     d(1,0) = 0;
00083     d(1,1) = 5;
00084     d(1,2) = 14;
00085 
00086     const double delta = 1e-9;
00087     const double epsilon = 1e-5;
00088     unit_assert_matrices_equal(d, f.differenceQuotient(args,delta), epsilon);
00089 }
00090 
00091 
00092 class ParametrizedCosine: public ParametrizedFunction<double>
00093 {
00094     // F(x) = Acos(Bx), p = <A, B>
00095 
00096     public:
00097 
00098     virtual unsigned int parameterCount() const {return 2;}
00099 
00100     virtual double operator()(double x, const ublas::vector<double>& p) const
00101     {
00102         preprocess(x,p);
00103         return A_*cosBx_;
00104     }
00105 
00106 
00107     virtual ublas::vector<double> dp(double x, const ublas::vector<double>& p) const
00108     {
00109         preprocess(x,p);
00110         ublas::vector<double> v(2);
00111         v(0) = cosBx_;          // dF/dA
00112         v(1) = -A_*x_*sinBx_;   // dF/dB
00113         return v;
00114     }
00115 
00116 
00117     virtual ublas::matrix<double> dp2(double x, const ublas::vector<double>& p) const
00118     {
00119         preprocess(x,p);
00120         ublas::matrix<double> m(2,2);
00121         m(0,0) = 0;                     // d2F/dA2
00122         m(1,0) = m(0,1) = -x_*sinBx_;   // d2F/dAdB
00123         m(1,1) = -A_*x_*x_*cosBx_;      // d2F/dB2
00124         return m;
00125     }
00126 
00127 
00128     private:
00129 
00130     void preprocess(double x, const ublas::vector<double>& p) const
00131     {
00132         // check parameter size
00133         if (p.size() != parameterCount())
00134             throw logic_error("[Parabola] Wrong parameter size.");
00135 
00136         // cache arguments and do expensive calculations
00137         if (x!=x_ || p(0)!=A_ || p(1)!=B_)
00138         {
00139             x_ = x;
00140             A_ = p(0);
00141             B_ = p(1);
00142             sinBx_ = sin(B_*x);
00143             cosBx_ = cos(B_*x);
00144         }
00145         else
00146         {
00147             //if (os_) *os_ << "cache hit!\n";
00148         }
00149     }
00150 
00151     // cached values
00152     mutable double x_;
00153     mutable double A_;
00154     mutable double B_;
00155     mutable double sinBx_;
00156     mutable double cosBx_;
00157 };
00158

00160 void testDerivatives()
00161 {
00162     if (os_) *os_ << "****************************************************\n";
00163     if (os_) *os_ << "testDerivatives()\n";
00164 
00165     ParametrizedCosine f;
00166 
00167     ublas::vector<double> p(2);
00168     p(0) = 5;
00169     p(1) = M_PI/4;
00170 
00171     for (int i=0; i<8; i++)
00172         DerivativeTest::testDerivatives(f, i, p, os_);
00173 }
00174 
00175 
00176 void testErrorFunction()
00177 {
00178     if (os_) *os_ << "****************************************************\n";
00179     if (os_) *os_ << "testErrorFunction()\n";
00180 
00181     ParametrizedCosine f;
00182 
00183     ublas::vector<double> p(2);
00184     p(0) = 4;
00185     p(1) = 30;
00186 
00187     ParametrizedCosine::ErrorFunction::Data data;
00188     typedef ParametrizedCosine::ErrorFunction::Datum Datum;
00189     data.push_back(Datum(0,3));
00190     data.push_back(Datum(M_PI/2,0));
00191 
00192     ParametrizedCosine::ErrorFunction e(f, data);
00193     if (os_) *os_ << "error: " << e(p) << endl;
00194 
00195     DerivativeTest::testDerivatives<double>(e, p, os_);
00196 
00197     if (os_) *os_ << "8*pi^2: " << 8*M_PI*M_PI << endl;
00198 }
00199 
00200 
00201 void testErrorLorentzian()
00202 {
00203     if (os_) *os_ << "****************************************************\n";
00204     if (os_) *os_ << "testErrorLorentzian()\n";
00205 
00206     TruncatedLorentzian f(1);
00207 
00208     ublas::vector<double> p(4);
00209     p(TruncatedLorentzian::AlphaR) = 1;
00210     p(TruncatedLorentzian::AlphaI) = 5;
00211     p(TruncatedLorentzian::Tau) = 2;
00212     p(TruncatedLorentzian::F0) = 0;
00213 
00214     TruncatedLorentzian::ErrorFunction::Data data;
00215     typedef TruncatedLorentzian::ErrorFunction::Datum Datum;
00216     data.push_back(Datum(0,3));
00217     data.push_back(Datum(M_PI/2,0));
00218 
00219     TruncatedLorentzian::ErrorFunction e(f, data);
00220     if (os_) *os_ << "error: " << e(p) << endl;
00221 
00222     DerivativeTest::testDerivatives< complex<double> >(e, p, os_);
00223 }

00226 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00227 {
00228     try
00229     {
00230         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00231         if (os_) *os_ << "ParametrizedFunctionTest\n";
00232         testDifferenceQuotient();
00233         testDerivatives();
00234         testErrorFunction();
00235         testErrorLorentzian();
00236         return 0;
00237     }
00238     catch (exception& e)
00239     {
00240         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00241         return 1;
00242     }
00243 }
